links.to_node: I will experience increased stress due to the ongoing responsibility and the condition of the living environment.
The dog will receive some care and attention, potentially improving its well-being slightly.
My mother and younger sister may feel some relief as my help reduces their workload.
My older sister might continue to neglect her responsibilities, assuming others will cover for me.
The living conditions in the apartment may improve marginally if I am diligent in cleaning up after the dog.
My relationship with my older sister may remain strained or worsen due to the ongoing situation.
The dog's behavior and training may see slight improvements if I attempt to train it.
